=== Summary ===
Ubuntu-be.org regularly has a booth at the well known <nowiki>[[http://www.dipro.be|Dipro MicroMega computerfairs]]</nowiki> and in other events. Please ask questions about this activity to the ubuntu-be.org mailing list.
